hero.core_tension: Decision tension: choose when to convert flagship hours into content-first activations to maximize footfall and earned media. The mechanism is simple. This maps to the Store-as-Studio signal and the 6-week flagship pilot activation play (S1).
hero.setting: Wide, spare flagship interior. Low fixtures. Clean negative space. Composition cue: three-quarter angle, shallow depth, polished concrete floor, warm wood accents.
hero.persona: Brand marketing director and creative producer in rehearsal. Both standing center-left, collaborating over a layout board referencing the four branded content sessions.
hero.action: Staging a branded content session setup. One operator adjusts lighting while another marks RSVP counts on a small clipboard. Movement is deliberate.
hero.urgency_symbol: A band of confident light across the floor that arcs toward the entry. Symbolizes high-value windows without literal timing props.
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights and deep but clean shadows. High-key on subjects. Soft falloff to negative space.
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, assured. The leverage point sits here.
hero.alt: Brand lead and creative producer stage a content session in a flagship store during a high-value activation.

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings radiating from a central flagship node. Inner ring footfall. Mid ring social reach. Outer ring partner value and sales arcs.
elements: tokens for S1 S2 S3 S4 S5
signal_map.motion: Arrows flow clockwise from attention to earned media to partner conversions. Momentum locks at the flagship node to show concentrated lift during high-value windows.
signal_map.palette: Matte stone neutrals with a single punch accent in warm gold for earned media and teal for data signals. Materials: paper texture for rings, glass sheen for nodes.
signal_map.alt: Circular signal map linking footfall, social reach, and partner value around a Store-as-Studio flagship node.

case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial side light. Soft rim on subjects. Clean negative foreground.
case_studies.mood: Practical, opportunistic, civic-minded. This changes one thing about how operators should think.
case_studies.alt: Property manager and artist prepare a rotating residency in a vacant storefront to boost mall dwell time.
